actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sympathy of the House of Representatives to the people of Guatemala.

summary.text: Extends the deepest sympathy of the House of Representatives to the President and to the people of Guatemala in this dark hour of their suffering and distress. Calls upon the Executive Branch of the United States Government to develop programs to assist the people of Guatemala in their efforts to relieve the suffering caused by the disaster and to rehabilitate their nation from the damage inflicted.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sympathy of the House of Representatives to the people of Guatemala.
